doc.title: Inca Pottery
doc.plot: Celeste breaks into Veronica's house, binds and gags the unfortunate lady and steals her precious Inca vase. With the help of a friend, Veronica breaks into Celeste's house and snatches back her pot. She's not in possession long, because Celeste steals in back, leaving the buxom blonde tied topless to a chair. Finally the menfolk have enough of this foolishness and leave both ladies securely bound and muzzled. In a second story line, Marsha fantasizes about being captured by a mysterious assailant and being left in bondage.
